properties.name: columns
properties.doc:
The list of weights for each column. For example, `"1 2"` creates a 2 column grid:
  • 1fr
  • 2fr
The creation of multiple same size columns can be simplified by using the multiply sign eg. "5*1" is equivalent to "1 1 1 1 1".

properties.name: columns[mobile]
properties.doc: The list of weights for each column, when displayed on a mobile device. The syntax is the same as for columns.

properties.name: gap
properties.doc: The size of the gap between the columns.
